mapper.insert: INSERT INTO good(goodno, fboardno, memberno, rdate) VALUES(good_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{fboardno}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT goodno, fboardno, memberno, rdate FROM good ORDER BY goodno DESC
SELECT g.goodno, m.memberno, g.fboardno, f.ftitle, g.rdate FROM fboard f, good g, member m WHERE (f.fboardno = g.fboardno) AND m.memberno=#{memberno} ORDER BY g.goodno DESC
